name: FXGSaveOptions
shortdesc: Options which may be supplied when saving a document as an FXG file.

property.name: saveMultipleArtboards
property.shortdesc: All the artboards or range of the artboards will be saved.

property.name: artboardRange
property.shortdesc: If SaveMultipleArtboards is true,this will be considered for multi-asset extraction which specifies artboard range.Empty string will extracts all the artboards.Default is empty string.

property.name: version
property.shortdesc: The version of the FXG file format to create.

property.name: preserveEditingCapabilities
property.shortdesc: Choose to preserve the editing capabilities of FXG.

property.name: downsampleLinkedImages
property.shortdesc: Choose to downsample the linked images(72ppi)

property.name: filtersPolicy
property.shortdesc: The policy used by FXG to preserve filters.

property.name: textPolicy
property.shortdesc: The policy used by FXG to preserve text.

property.name: gradientsPolicy
property.shortdesc: The policy used by FXG to preserve gradients.

property.name: blendsPolicy
property.shortdesc: The policy used by FXG to expand blends.
